results.title: Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I
results.text_hl: In addition, recent evidence has suggested its anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and antinociceptive actions during @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Somatoform_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013001 @@@pain disorders@@@. Herein, we investigated the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in an animal model of @DISEASE_Reflex_Sympathetic_Dystrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D012019 @@@complex regional pain syndrome-type I@@@, and its underlying mechanisms.

citations.NLM: Vieira G, Cavalli J, Gonçalves ECD, Gonçalves TR, Laurindo LR, Cola M, Dutra RC. Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I Front Pharmacol. 2017;8():584. PMID: 28928655
